initial_delay.description: Delay before the first bomb is fired.

wander_offset_radius_min.description: The minimum distance from last bomb in salvoe.

wander_offset_radius_max.description: The maximum distance from last bomb in salvoe.

num_salvos.description: Number of times the stratagem will fire.

area_size.description: A random offset applied to a bomb position, not affecting the salvo's wandering.

wander_start_area_radius.description: The maximum extents of the bombardment's initial wander offset.

fire_height.description: A fixed height from where the bombs will be fired.

firing_angle_offset.description: a vector offset to apply to the firing direction of the bombs

fire_from_ship.description: [bool]Whether to fire from the ship's position, or from straight above.

projectile_types.description: Type of projectile it fires. If more than one is specified, it will act like a pattern until the salvoe ends.

speed.description: The forward speed of the bombardment, if it has any. Used on stratagems like the Walking Barrage.

muzzle_flash.description: [particles]Particle effect of the muzzle flash, played on attach_muzzle.

walk_angle.description: Angle relative to forward direction that the bombardment will walk. Clockwise, in degrees.

walk_offset_fraction.description: Fraction of the walk that should happen before behind the target. Set to 0.5 to center on the spawn position.

destroyer_stratagem_fire.description: [wwise]We are triggering a loop for this so we do not get event spamming

tag_avoidances.description: List of tags to avoid for each individual projectile this bombardment spawns.

tag_avoidance_distance.description: The minimum distance from entities with that has a tag in 'tag_avoidance' for each individual projectile.

first_projectile_destroyed_audio_event.description: [wwise]Called when the first projectile is destroyed (Projectile destroyed event is called if not set)

projectile_destroyed_audio_event.description: [wwise]Called when a projectile is destroyed (and there's not another override)

final_projectile_destroyed_audio_event.description: [wwise]Called when the last projectile is destroyed (Projectile destroyed event is called if not set)
